name: Blue Solutions
description:
Blue Solutions was founded in 2000 with a clear mission: to enable IT channel partners to sell managed services software that would boost recurring revenues, strengthen margins, and clearly differentiate their offerings in a crowded market.
Our relationships with both established and agile new vendors, like AppRiver, Bitdefender, Censornet, ConnectWise, DataFortress, Malwarebytes, Microsoft, Phish5, and Trend Micro, have brought the company the highest proportion of MSP partners of any software distributor.
